name: Saucy Boy Adventures
description:
Oh dear! Saucy Boy has no sauce to make hot dogs for his girlfriend, Saucy Girl.

Help Saucy Boy obtain three different condiments: ketchup, mustard, and mayo!

  • A brisk & breezy cute-em-up adventure!
  • Three levels and four huge bosses!
  • NES inspired graphics and chiptune soundtrack!

Saucy Boy Adventures is the first game by indie animators Rhubarb Zoo, the creators of Entropy.

Get the soundtrack here:
https://danejacobs.bandcamp.com/album/saucy-boy-adventures-ost
